vote.title: An ordinance authorizing (1) the issuance and sale of City of Dallas, Texas, Combination Tax and Revenue Certificates of Obligation, Series 2024 in an aggregate principal amount not to exceed $239,500,000; (2) levying a tax in payment thereof; (3) prescribing the form of said certificates; (4) approving and awarding the sale of the certificates and approving execution of a purchase agreement; (5) approving the official statement; and (6) enacting provisions incident and relating to the subject - Not to exceed $1,093,980 - Financing: 2024 Certificates of Obligation Funds
vote.description: An ordinance authorizing (1) the issuance and sale of City of Dallas, Texas, Combination Tax and Revenue Certificates of Obligation, Series 2024 in an aggregate principal amount not to exceed $239,500,000; (2) levying a tax in payment thereof; (3) prescribing the form of said certificates; (4) approving and awarding the sale of the certificates and approving execution of a purchase agreement; (5) approving the official statement; and (6) enacting provisions incident and relating to the subject - Not to exceed $1,093,980 - Financing: 2024 Certificates of Obligation Funds
